entities: International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
summary:
The Security Council, 
Recalling resolution 1503 (2003) of 28 August 2003, 
Appoints Mrs. Carla Del Ponte as Prosecutor of the International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia with effect from 15 September 2003 for a four-year term, 
Having considered the nomination by the Secretary-General of Mrs. Carla Del Ponte as Prosecutor.
